name: PETRA THEOS
description:
- PLOT -

When a lone man searches for his missing dog deep within the snow-covered forest, he finds a mysterious Rock with dark powers.

- WARNING - 

This game contains: Cannibalism, and Flashing Lights

- CONTROLS - 

WASD - move

LEFT SHIFT - Sprint

MOUSE - look

LEFT CLICK - Interact

This is a standalone version of the HPSI Madvent Calendar III version

Original Soundtrack available on Bandcamp:

https://beatwizardmusic.bandcamp.com/album/petra-theos-original-soundtrack
